page.title: 06A Day in the Life of a child
page.content: Awake 07.00 Breakfast-toast.07.30 get ready for school.08.30 set off for school.Usually drove but today we walked.Arrive 08.50.08.55 bell rings. 09.15 school assembly,09.40 English then some mental arithmetic.10.30 playtime.Iplayed catch and touch off ground.10.50 maths-graphs.12.00 lunch time,(sandwiches)then out to play.13.15 Topic-wildlife in ponds and streams.14.30 playtime.14.45 back to class. 15.30 prepare to go home 15.45 school finishes.Dad pickes me up to drive my sister and me home.Get ready to go to ballet class,have tea.Ballet class 17.00-18.00.Mum pickes me up.we go home to pick up my sister and dad to go to sports centre to play badminton.Got home about 21.00.had a bath,cleaned my teeth,got into bed and fell straight to sleep.
